Package com.intellij.codeInsight.daemon

Interface NonHideableIconGutterMark

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GutterMark
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiffGutterRenderer, GutterActionRenderer

    public interface NonHideableIconGutterMark
extends GutterMark
    A marker interface, that allows to show gutter icon even with "do not show gutter icons" option enabled.
    See Also:
    EditorSettings.areGutterIconsShown()

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.intellij.codeInsight.daemon.GutterMark

        getIcon, getTooltipText
